content:
It has come to my notice that the output from the full-ig.zip file differs from the output in the local build. In particular, the 'Snapshot' view of some profiles does not show the full data-hierarchy. In a Patient profile for example, the Snapshot data-hierarchy ends with the 'birthDate' element but as you know, there are several more elements in this Resource. paitientSnapshotCutShort.PNG

Is this a known problem?

To confirm - you started with an empty output folder, you ran the local build and looked at the full-ig.zip file produced in the local build and it contains different content in the zip than are in the folder?
If so, that's not a known problem - and I have no idea how it's even possible given that the zip is generated by zipping the files in the output folder...
@Lloyd McKenzie Thank you Lloyd. I checked with the colleague who had created the build and there may have been some temp files hanging around. A fresh build has rectified the problem.
Great. If you can reproduce a scenario where a full build is impacted by a previous build, please submit a change request because that shouldn't happen.
